did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Dept. of Floriculture and Ornamental Horticulture records, 1910-1990.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences. Department of Floriculture and Ornamental Horticulture.

did.physdesc: Organizational records, correspondence, photographs, and printed material.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, papers, journals, photographs, and other records of the Department of Floriculture and Ornamental Horticulture, New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences, at Cornell University.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Dept. of Floriculture and Ornamental Horticulture formed in 1922 when Landscape Art and Drawing combined with Floriculture.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, papers, journals, photographs, and other records of the Department of Floriculture and Ornamental Horticulture, New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences, at Cornell University. Includes slides of various campus scenes, including Minns Garden.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences.

New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
